channel.title: Canada on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Canada on madewhere

item.title: Channellock
item.description: Channellock is a tool manufacturer, probably best known for their channel-locking pliers. They offer a variety of gripping tools, made in the USA. Unfortunately not all of their products are USA-made, but those that are carry a prominent label. Those that are not do not denote their origin in an obvious manner.

item.title: Nab Leather Co
item.description: Nab Leather Co is a leather goods manufacturer in Ontario, Canada. They produce belts, wallets, and other accessories.

item.title: Reigning Champ
item.description: Reigning Champ is an athletic wear designer and manufacturer, based in Vancouver, BC. All of their products are made in Canada.

item.title: Mission Workshop
item.description: Mission Workshop is a San Francisco-based maker of bags and technical clothing; they focused mostly on bike gear, but have since diversified into more technical wear. Much of their technical gear isn’t made in the USA, so be sure to check on a product-by-product basis.

item.title: Redwood Classics
item.description: Casual wear manufacturer based in Canada. A cursory glance suggests they make all of their clothing in Canada.
